heading: One-stop shipping
label solutions
banner.subHeading: A shipping software that integrates multiple reputable carriers, helping sellers purchase official shipping labels at optimal costs.
listContents: Buy official shipping labels at good prices

createPersonalized.title: Create personalized pricing for each customer group
contents: Customize packaging fees and shipping fees based on customer groups.
Offer exclusive deals for agents and loyal partners - retain long-term customers and increase revenue.

myCarrier.title: My Carrier – Create your own shipping carrier
contents: Build your own “My Carrier” under your brand name and earn commission from shipping rate differences.
An ideal solution for international sellers or dropship/B2B merchants who want full control over shipping.

autoBuyLabel.title: Auto Buy Label – Automatically purchase official shipping labels

contents.value: Automatically buy the most suitable label as soon as an order is placed.
Compare shipping rates and delivery times across multiple carriers before choosing.
100% official labels, up to 20% more affordable than market prices. No worries about lost packages, returns, or account suspension.

contents.title: Multi-carrier integrations
subTitle: Connect to unlimited domestic and international shipping companies so businesses have several choices that suit specific needs.
We support taking goods from multiple warehouses to help businesses shorten transportation costs.

contents.title: Manage in a single dashboard
subTitle: Too tired of logging into several accounts of different carriers? Ship4P helps save time and effort on shipment management by integrating your carrier accounts into one system.

trackAndTrace.title: Track & Trace – Centralized tracking
contents: Manage order statuses from multiple carriers on a single dashboard.
Automatically update all delivery status changes in real time: in transit, failed, delivered, etc.
No need to visit each carrier's website to track shipments.

flexible.title: Flexible shipping integration
contents: Use Ship4P’s built-in system to connect with any carrier—no need to sign separate contracts with each one.
Easily connect to carriers you’ve previously worked with.
Create your own “My Carrier” and take full control of the delivery process.

realTime.title: Real-time reporting
contents: Export detailed reports on shipping costs, order processing speed, and more.
Measure delivery performance and optimize your operations.

sayGoodbye.heading: Say goodbye to shipping chaos
sayGoodbye.subHeading: Ship4P eliminates the complexity of shipping management – everything is simple, centralized, and automated.

items.title: Save on shipping costs
items.subTitle: Ship4P aggregates orders from multiple sellers, enabling better shipping rate negotiations – the more orders, the lower the price.

items.title: Compare & choose the best rates
items.subTitle: Access discounted prices from dozens of carriers and maximize your delivery cost savings.

items.title: Quick label generation
items.subTitle: Create and print official shipping labels in bulk with just a few clicks.

items.title: White label software
items.subTitle: Build your own multi-channel shipping software with our white label service.

items.title: Centralized order management
items.subTitle: Track all orders from various carriers on a single screen.

items.title: Shipping API
items.subTitle: Get real-time updates on rates and shipment status.

connecting.heading: Connect multiple carriers on a single platform
connecting.subHeading: A multi-carrier integration software that delivers several shipping options for merchants.

contents.title: Login
contents.subTitle: Log in to your IChiba account, create a workspace, and activate the Ship4P app.

contents.title: Set up carrier connections
contents.subTitle: There are two options for connecting with shipping carriers:

items.title: Via the seller’s account:
items.subTitle: Sellers connect the carriers they’re using.

items.title: Via Ship4P:
items.subTitle: Ship4P has pre-integrated dozens of domestic and international carriers. Sellers only need to click 'Connect' to activate their preferred carriers.

contents.title: Create shipping labels
contents.subTitle: Click on 'Create Shipment', fill in the necessary details, and select the most suitable carrier recommended by Ship4P.

contents.title: Track shipments
contents.subTitle: Easily look up and track shipments from multiple carriers on a single dashboard.

faqs.label: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.title: Optimize multi-carrier shipping with Ship4P’s One-Stop Shipping Label Solution
faqs.subtitle: FREE lifetime software usage!

contents.title: Is Ship4P suitable for small shops?
contents.content: Yes. Even if you only have a few orders per day, Ship4P helps you save time and choose the best carrier.

contents.title: Can I use my own delivery provider?
contents.content: Yes. You have 3 options: use Ship4P’s built-in system, connect to a carrier you’ve previously worked with, or create your own carrier (My Carrier).

contents.title: I sell internationally. Does Ship4P support that?
contents.content: Yes. Ship4P integrates with international carriers like DHL, UPS, and FedEx, making it easy for sellers to ship globally—whether it’s bulky items, small parcels, or large volumes.

software.title: Software tour guide
software.subTitle: Manage domestic and international shipments on a screen. Connect with shipping companies within 2 seconds. Let’s see how!

weBuild.heading: We build bridges between carriers businesses

before.title: Before Ship4P
contents: Must work on many delivery websites separately.
Possibly purchase fake shipping labels, which can result in returned shipments and being blacklisted by the carrier.
Cannot compare shipping rates.
Have to visit each carrier’s website to check order journeys.
Complicated manual reconciliation.

after.title: After Ship4P
contents: Access Ship4P only once for multi-carrier management.
Official, affordable shipping labels.
Smart AI integration helps select the most suitable shipping carrier.
Update order status automatically, ALL-IN-ONE tracking number system.
Check and pay quickly and accurately.

items.title: Multi-carrier integrations
content: Connect to unlimited domestic and international shipping companies so businesses have several choices that suit specific needs.
We support taking goods from multiple warehouses to help businesses shorten transportation costs.

items.title: Manage in a single dashboard
content: Too tired of logging into several accounts of different carriers? Ship4P helps save time and effort on shipment management by integrating your carrier accounts into one system.

items.title: Purchase official shipping labels
content: Buy domestic and international shipping labels from top-notch carriers. Easily compare prices and delivery times.
100% official labels at the best prices. No worries about lost packages, returns, or account suspensions.

items.title: Easy to get started, no hassle
content: Ship4P has connected with 50+ last-mile and international carriers worldwide, so sellers just use the software without signing contracts with each delivery company.

items.title: Shared shipping
content: Consolidate orders per months from different sellers to get a bigger number of orders. Through this consolidation, Ship4P can negotiate with shipping companies to offer a more favorable price, reducing shipping costs for each order.

contents.title: Choose your shipping option flexibly
contents.subTitle: Effortlessly compare shipping rates across multiple carriers. Sellers can pick the right carrier based on estimated time and cost.

contents.title: Track shipments in real-time
contents.subTitle: Actively monitor shipments through the API system and send real-time notifications, optimizing shipping efficiency and user satisfaction.

items.title: Sort out reconciliation quickly and accurately
items.subTitle: Easily reconcile shipping costs when creating shipments to ensure accuracy. Collect and settle COD payments monthly.

items.title: Advanced reports
items.subTitle: Make it easy to analyze shipment performance and generate customized shipping reports with various options such as by date, shipment type, status, and more.

items.title: Fit every seller’s industry
items.content: Diverse functionalities that suit multiple purposes and scales of businesses.

items.title: Manage both international and last-mile delivery
items.content: Easily purchase international and last-mile shipping labels, and track shipments in real time anytime.
